page.title: 08Urban Renewal in Paisley
page.content: {Well St.}is a busy tenement area. Below the houses are many shops. These houses had fallen into disrepair. {Renfrew District Council}has made this an{Action Area}and is renovating the tenements and building new sheltered housing. This has greatly improved the area. The tenements have been{sandblasted and{re-roofed}.{New windows}have been put in and the interiors have been completely modernised with new {floorboards, bathroom suites}and {kitchen units.}There is an{intercom {door-entry system}to stop vandalism of closes and make people feel secure. The new houses have{parking spaces provided and{grassed areas}for children.All in all, this has made a big improvment in Well St.
